LANGUAGE.LABEL: Import Prospects
The Prospect Import File must be a comma delimited (CSV) format. Fields that contain commas must be contained within double quotes. Missing fields can be skipped with consecutive commas (, ,).

Each row of the file must include at least the Sales Campaign Number and the Prospect Name. Optional fields include the member number, contact first name, contact last name, Title, Email, Day Phone, Night Phone, Street, Unit, City, State, Zip, Country.
1, "Acme, Inc.", 0, Bob, Jones, President, bob@jones.com, (214)345-9876, , 123 Main Street, , Dallas, TX, 75075, USA
Submit
